data.name: Deity Demo
data.detailed_description:
A journey into the unknown, the meditative, the ethereal, the magical, the surreal... the enchanting, the entrancing, the mesmerizing...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The Land of the Gods ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"A Dreamy Euphoria"

"A Meditative Zen"

"An Enchanting Dance Thru the Ethereal"

data.short_description: A journey into the unknown, the meditative, the ethereal, the magical, the surreal... the enchanting, the entrancing, the mesmerizing...The Land of the Gods...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 480, AMD Radeon 7870
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 480, AMD Radeon 7870
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
